verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> LORD קְ֭רָאתִיךָ <WH7121> I cry ח֣וּשָׁה <WH2363> unto thee make haste לִּ֑י הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <WH238> unto me give ear ק֝וֹלִ֗י <WH6963> unto my voice בְּקָרְאִי־ <WH7121> when I cry לָֽךְ׃

תִּכּ֤וֹן <WH3559> be set forth תְּפִלָּתִ֣י <WH8605> Let my prayer קְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> thee [as] incense לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> before מַֽשְׂאַ֥ת <WH4864> [and] the lifting up כַּ֝פַּ֗י <WH3709> of my hands מִנְחַת־ <WH4503> sacrifice עָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> [as] the evening

שִׁיתָ֣ה <WH7896> Set יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD שָׁמְרָ֣ה <WH8108> a watch לְפִ֑י <WH6310> before my mouth נִ֝צְּרָ֗ה <WH5341> keep עַל־ <WH5921> over דַּ֥ל <WH1817> the door שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <WH8193> of my lips אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּט־ <WH5186> afternoon

לִבִּ֨י <WH3820> not my heart לְדָבָ֪ר ׀ <WH1697> thing רָ֡ע <WH7451> to [any] evil לְהִתְע֘וֹלֵ֤ל <WH5953> to practise עֲלִל֨וֹת ׀ <WH5949> works בְּרֶ֗שַׁע <WH7562> wicked אֶת־ <WH854> for אִישִׁ֥ים <WH582> who פֹּֽעֲלֵי־ <WH6466> that work אָ֑וֶן <WH205> iniquity וּבַל־ <WH1077> lest אֶ֝לְחַ֗ם <WH3898> and let me not eat בְּמַנְעַמֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH4516> of their dainties

יֶֽהֶלְמֵֽנִי־ <WH1986> smite צַדִּ֨יק ׀ <WH6662> Let the righteous חֶ֡סֶד <WH2617> me [it shall be] a kindness וְֽיוֹכִיחֵ֗נִי <WH3198> and let him reprove שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil רֹ֭אשׁ <WH7218> me [it shall be] an excellent אַל־ <WH408> nay יָנִ֣י <WH5106> [which] shall not break רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> my head כִּי־ <WH3588> For ע֥וֹד <WH5750> still וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <WH8605> for yet my prayer בְּרָעוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7451> also [shall be] in their calamities

נִשְׁמְט֣וּ <WH8058> are overthrown בִֽידֵי־ <WH3027> places סֶ֭לַע <WH5553> in stony שֹׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8199> When their judges וְשָׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> they shall hear אֲ֝מָרַ֗י <WH561> my words כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נָעֵֽמוּ׃ <WH5276> for they are sweet

כְּמ֤וֹ <WH3644> one פֹלֵ֣חַ <WH6398> as when one cutteth וּבֹקֵ֣עַ <WH1234> and cleaveth בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> [wood] upon the earth נִפְזְר֥וּ <WH6340> are scattered עֲ֝צָמֵ֗ינוּ <WH6106> Our bones לְפִ֣י <WH6310> mouth שְׁאֽוֹל׃ <WH7585> at the grave's

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֵלֶ֨יךָ ׀ <WH413> are toward יְהוִ֣ה <WH3068> GOD אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord עֵינָ֑י <WH5869> But mine eyes בְּכָ֥ה חָ֝סִ֗יתִי <WH2620> in thee is my trust אַל־ <WH408> not תְּעַ֥ר <WH6168> destitute נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> not my soul

שָׁמְרֵ֗נִי <WH8104> Keep מִ֣ידֵי <WH3027> the jaws פַ֭ח <WH6341> of the trap יָ֣קְשׁוּ <WH3369> [which] they have laid לִ֑י וּ֝מֹקְשׁ֗וֹת <WH4170> for me and the gins פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> of the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> of iniquity

יִפְּל֣וּ <WH5307> fall בְמַכְמֹרָ֣יו <WH4364> into their own nets רְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> Let the wicked יַ֥חַד <WH3162> whilst that I withal אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <WH595> I עַֽד־ <WH5704> While אֶעֱבֽוֹר׃ <WH5674> escape
